metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13672 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Drupal core's sanitization APIfails to properly filter cross-site scripting under certain circumstances.This issue affects: Drupal Core 9.1.x versions prior to 9.1.7; 9.0.xversions prior to 9.0.12; 8.9.x versions prior to 8.9.14; 7.x versionsprior to 7.80.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
